comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elmer Ambrose Sperry (not sure why it shows F as the middle initial; it's definitely Elmer A. Sperry, though): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elmer_Ambrose_Sperry

comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: That does look like the guy in Wikipedia's picture.  But another possibility is E. Frank Sperry, mayor of Orlando, Florida, who died in office 1916.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the suggestions pennylrichardsca and Kestenbaum. I was unable to find a photo of E. Frank Sperry, but I found some more images in our collection of Elmer Ambrose Sperry. I'm pretty certain this photo shows him, so we will add his full name to the record.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: E. A. Sperry, appointed to the Naval Advisory Board in 1915, along with other scientific notables. Group photo, October, 1915: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0E12F93C5D1773...
